column20: who was known for her great gumbo
column23: duke basketball and atlanta braves baseball. she was a homemaker. she loved spending time with her family along with her husband. they held the distinction of being the longest married couple in mississippi. they were married for 75 years. she was a loving wife
column27: great grandmother. she enjoyed life and never met a stranger. she was always willing to do anything for anyone. her presence in all of our lives will be greatly missed. she is preceded in death by her parents
